sketchoutline.tool

Class TreeMaker

  • java.lang.Object
    • sketchoutline.tool.TreeMaker

  • public class TreeMaker
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is responsible for fetching and pre-processing code from the editor and calling the japa parser internally to generate a tree data structure which is accessed by the GUI.
    Author:
    Manindra Moharana

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  TreeMaker.TmNode
      Wrapper class to the Node class provided by japa parser.

    • Method Detail

      • xyToOffset

        public int xyToOffset(int x,
             int y)
        Converts a row no, column no. representation of cursor location to offset representation. Editor uses jTextArea internally which deals with only caret offset, not row no. and column no.
        Parameters:
        x - - row no.
        y - - column no.

      • xToOffset

        public int xToOffset(int x)
        Converts a row no to offset. Calls xyToOffset intrnally - xyToOffset(x,0)
        Parameters:
        x - - row no.

      • getWhiteSpaces

        public java.lang.String getWhiteSpaces(java.lang.String what)
        Returns a String consisting of only whitespaces of the same length as the input String.
        Parameters:
        what - - String whose whitespace String is to be returned
        Returns:
        String - whitespace String

      • processPDECode2

        public java.lang.String processPDECode2()
        Used only for testing.

      • processPDECode

        public java.lang.String processPDECode()
        Fetches code from the editor tabs and pre-processes it into parsable pure java.
        Handles:
      • Removal of import statements
      • Converts of int(), char(), etc to (int)(), (char)(), etc.
      • Replacing '#' with 0xff for color representation
      • Appends class declaration statement
Returns:
String - Pure java representation of PDE code

    Removes comments from input String
    Parameters:

    Returns:
    String - The processed string with comments removed.
